section.section: This section applies throughout this State, whether on or off a highway.
For purposes of this section, any noise level above that adopted by the Administrator under § 22-601 of this article is excessive.

text.section: A person may not drive a motor vehicle in any improper manner intended to cause skidding.
A person may not drive a motor vehicle in any improper manner intended to cause spinning of wheels.
A person may not drive a motor vehicle in any improper manner intended to cause excessive noise.
